Title: About the Rails FAQ category
Post: Ruby on Rails is a web application framework working with the language Ruby, enabling developers to quickly and easily develop web applications. This forum category covers the Codecademy courses on Ruby on Rails.

> <%= image_tag( t.image ) %> >
